long_description: Use this nylon footprint under your Sierra Designs Zolo 2 tent to protect its floor from abrasion and wear while camping. 96 x 54 in. dimensions are slightly smaller than the corresponding tent (not included), preventing water from pooling between the tent and footprint in rainy weather. Webbing stake-outs at corners allow easy attachment to tent. Closeout.
short_description: Use this nylon footprint under your Sierra Designs Zolo 2 tent to protect its floor from abrasion and wear while camping.
